issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

Base UI => Views => Web Views => Local URL

click button to hide toolbar and there will be white space where the toolbar used to be.

this only seems to occur when the html doc has a background-color specified on the body. if you use the web view's background color property on the object, it works fine.

{html}
fields.summary: hiding toolbar with webview that has css bg color leaves toolbar residue

comments.body:
{html}

Was able to recreate earlier, could not recreate now. Marking as resolved because I think it was fixed during an earlier bugfix.

{html}
